nodes.text: Corstris was a heavily-forested planet in the Quelii sector of the Outer Rim.
Imperial Intelligence suspected Corstris to be the location of a hidden Rebel Alliance base before the Battle of Yavin.
Its terrain did not improve Han Solo's opinion of forested worlds during the time he served there.
The PC video game Star Wars: Rebellion places Corstris in the "Quelli sector," a misspelling of the true Quelii sector.
